src:
AP Top Business News at 7:07 a.m. EDT
02 Nov 2019, 04:00 by EndPlay
ASEAN meeting grapples with trade war, territorial disputes
US economy defies threats with a solid job gain for October
China's economy struggles as consumers tighten belts
Governor threatens possible PG&E takeover if no plan is made
Widespread glitches occur on 1st day of 'Obamacare' sign-ups
One big step: Google buys Fitbit for $2.1 billion
UK halts support for fracking due to earthquake fears
Retailers seek to stretch shortened holiday shopping season
Brexit Party wants to team up with Tories; Johnson says no
Trade body: China can hit US with sanctions worth $3.6 bln
Copyright 2019 The Associated Press. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed.
